Posts.Content: Mar 23, 2009 07:30AM KarenFtoo wrote: Hi Gigi, I too had the same dx you have.  I was dx in November of 2008.  As you know everyone is different . . . I can only share my choice and my feelings. I have a strong family hx of BC so for me I chose to have bilateral mx.  I had DCIS in left breast with questionable areas in right breast.  It was a very early dx.  I did not want to have to go through all of this again in 5 years, 10 years etc.  And... there was no way of telling how long it had been there already.  At time of surgery, my BS did find a very small amount of invasive cancer in my left breast... very very small but it was there, so I am glad I made the decision I did.  I am now in reconstruction phase, I have TE in and my exchange surgery is scheduled for May 18th.  I am counting the days.  You just have to make the best decision that fits you.  Hugs to you.
